website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list when it comes to value. It won't handle major digging, but it's an affordable option for those whose budget is their top priority.
pros: A basic yet well-made digging shovel that tackles most tasks in the garden and yard
Mid-range weight makes it stable and easy to use
cons: Wooden handle feels sturdy for most jobs but not heavy-duty enough for professional-level work or digging heavy materials

customer_reviews.title: I'm a 5ft2 woman and this shovel works for me ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5ft2 woman and this shovel works for me. It has that flat part on the top of the shovelhead that you push on with your foot to dig deep. I don't know what it's called and I didn't know I needed it, but this shovel has it! I dug up a 7x7 area in my backyard to level for a hot tub and this shovel did the trick, no blisters at all. I cleaned it after each use and no rust has developed as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Nice shovel but..
customer_reviews.text: I can see the grain orientation on the wood handle is wrong. It's in the weakest position possible. It may hold up for awhile. I've got a new handle to replace it with (correctly) when it breaks. Such a sturdy shovel, it would be nice if they could pay attention to something so simple. Just a twist to the handle in either direction and it would be in it's optimal position. Just the luck of the draw for those who got one with the grain right I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: BDG

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and large and long handled shovel
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shovel. It is heavy duty and quite big. The only thing I would say against this shovel is if you are a short person then maybe purchasing a smaller shovel would be better because this shovel is huge and great for anyone who does yard work or any type of chores that requires a shovel, just quite a bit long handled for a short person of five feet.
customer_reviews.author: Berdenia

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the add tricks
customer_reviews.text: Add does not match description of product. Thought I was getting a deal until a wood handled shovel showed up. My mistake for thinking I would get anything other than the picture used. Not happy with the add tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about a yard tool when leaving a review right? Well, I can say that is is a very effective tool for digging up sand and yard dirt for under an above ground pool and when we built a recessed patio. It was instrumental in both projects and stood up to 3 weeks of work. Hubby and I could both use it without any "Ah! this is too heavy for me to use" issues.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Open to It

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sturdy shovel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sturdy shovel . Not much to complain about . My husband breaks every tool in the house and hasn’t broken this one! It has a good pole length too
customer_reviews.author: Chad Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great shovel I am in love with this shovel
customer_reviews.text: Great shovel I am in love with this shovel. It's everything you could want, and I especially like the flanged foot plates that you can stomp on to get into the soil with better force. My disappointment is that I paid 35.00+ and it is now 12.99. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: peppermint patty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shovel, super high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this shovel surprised me. It's so high quality. We have put this thing through many, many days of digging up rocks and concrete and it hasn't given up on us one bit. Ames always makes good products, but this one has surprised me once again. Awesome shovel.
customer_reviews.author: butler_ke

customer_reviews.title: Flexible flyer
customer_reviews.text: If this is forged I have a bridge to sell you, used it today and no better than a ten dollar shovel, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Snapped in half. I got three hours total out ...
customer_reviews.text: Snapped in half. I got three hours total out of this from digging up dirt under light duty loads.
customer_reviews.author: S550Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Based off the pictures and description I thought it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Based off the pictures and description I thought it was a fiberglass handle but a wood handle shovel was sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Agt954

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I keep this shovel outside for cleaning up the yard after the dog does you-know-what and this shovel had withstood the elements! Rain, snow, heat...it hasn't rusted or fallen apart!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Shuck

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first day of use
customer_reviews.text: It broke above the metal the first day I used it to shovel top soil.
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good solid shovel
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good solid shovel, fits perfectly in the shovel holder on my overland rig. The picture shown doesn't match the item delivered, but the description for wooden handle is correct. I hope this will last for many adventures.
customer_reviews.author: MacGyver Jr.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this one
customer_reviews.text: It feels like it's going to break soon. I've been using it for a month in my garden and I can hear it cracking. I hope I don't have to replace it soon.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good spade. I cannot believe it was only $15
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good spade. I cannot believe it was only $15. It has a strong handle, what seems to be a strong iron head. And I had no problem doing some light gardening with it. Would strongly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ana A.

customer_reviews.title: Shovel to Last a Long TIme
customer_reviews.text: This is what was needed. It is comfortable to hold in my tender hands. Light weight, but sturdy. Long enough to reach into clean a driveway culvert.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ella Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great price although next time I’ll spend a little
customer_reviews.text: Handle already loosened in tx clay. Great price although next time I’ll spend a little more
customer_reviews.author: brian k

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Construction
customer_reviews.text: The first use in a garden resulted in the handle splintering from the metal. I only used it for planting a 3 gallon hydrangea. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Darrow

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, used in very hard ground with no problem
customer_reviews.author: joel westbrook

customer_reviews.title: A great shovel at a really reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly it was stolen (or "borrowed") after I'd only used it for one afternoon of gardening. I'm glad it's cheap enough to replace it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Bird

customer_reviews.title: Not Metal handle
customer_reviews.text: The shovel sent was wooden not metal as advertised. disappointing but stilll useable
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kingman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Berried a body in under 20 min this this thing.
customer_reviews.author: FAH-Q

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy, but I bent the tip my first time digging when I struck a rock
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: I dig it
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than I expected. Sturdy and makes using it very easy. Am very surprised at such a high quality yard tool at such an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than expected... should have paid closer attention to the description
customer_reviews.author: Kimra Stone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a True Temper shovel. They still make a quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I've used this on about 40 hours worth of work ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on about 40 hours worth of work. I have to be careful with it now because any moment it may break because I can hear the wood cracking when I'm trying to get something deep unwedged. The picture is misleading because it appears to be a steel shaft but it is wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Home garden helper
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for home gardening; seems like good quality, fairly light weight, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shovel.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shovel. The best part is there are raised edges on the shovel that you put your foot on that are great for really pushing the shovel into the dirt or whatever you are using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Great Shovel
customer_reviews.text: Well built shovel with good design for digging and comfortable handle!
customer_reviews.author: JCC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the presents your dog leaves you in the backyard!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value! Arrives in a very large box. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: katiegerdes

customer_reviews.title: The most amazing shovel EVER
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing shovel EVER! The majority of our property is clay and rock so you can imagine digging anything is a chore. This shovel is a boss! Well made, sturdy handle, still going strong after we landscaped all four sides of our house! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LindsJ2277

customer_reviews.title: You will "dig" this shovel!
customer_reviews.text: A nice, sturdy full-size shovel. It has a cushioned handle which makes it easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: C C K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It feels very cheap and feels like it is going to break when you dig
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Valdez

customer_reviews.title: this is great, but when I start trying to dig into ...
customer_reviews.text: As a cheap shovel...this is great, but when I start trying to dig into hard dirt it feels like it may break or come apart. It works for light gardening, but digging in hardpack may be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: The shovel head is good, but the handle is just average
customer_reviews.text: This shovel has wood handle, not fiberglass as some reported. The shovel head is good, but the handle is just average, you can buy the same quality at Home Depot for same or less...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this product arrived damaged. the rubberized handle cover on ...
customer_reviews.text: this product arrived damaged. the rubberized handle cover on the end of the shovel was split open. this item is junk!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mark gregorek

customer_reviews.title: The wood hand one should not be sold under the ...
customer_reviews.text: The wood hand one should not be sold under the same items with the fiberglass ones. I thought I was buying fiberglass but actually I ended up with a wood one.
customer_reviews.author: reynold0510

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great tool. Solid as a rock. I can dig it. Price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: John Howard

customer_reviews.title: which made me very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Well made product - of course it was made in America, which made me very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time out. Keep scrolling for a shovel ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke first time out. Keep scrolling for a shovel that works.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Dodge

customer_reviews.title: little confidence
customer_reviews.text: I've dug a bunch of holes with this thing so far. Every time I use it, the handle crackles and pops. I keep thinking to myself... alright, this is when it's gonna break. But it never does. It gets three stars because even though it does its job, it continues to amaze me that it hasn't broken yet. I KNOW it's going to break... It has to.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Glandsburg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just broke it trying to dig up some roots on a 6 month old tree... the tree has been planted as long as I've had the shovel.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shovel. Sturdy. Keep it in the garden shed and it gets used almost every day for something
customer_reviews.author: D. Price

customer_reviews.title: Save your Money. Buy a Fiskars Shovel.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, am I the only one here that knows a piece of junk ? So disappointed, maybe because I'm comparing it to my Fiskars shovel. When I pushed down on it with my foot the metal actually twisted and felt like it was going to snap. Not for a 200 lb man to use that's for sure. If I would have hit a root, forget it. I'm still shocked every review here said this was a good shovel. Someone is on the take.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars because this works great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Five stars because this works great for my needs, I'm know there is better out there, but I'm not a professional landscaper so for my level of play and the price, this works out perfectly for me. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Black

customer_reviews.title: Very used, didnt bother returning because it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very used, didnt bother returning because it is a shovel but the handle was worn and the shovel end was heavily scratched. WOW
customer_reviews.author: Robert Van ryn

product_meta.title: True Temper 2585600 Round Point Forged Shovel with Hardwood Handle and Comfort Step, 57-Inch
product_meta.description: Make that next gardening project a little easier with the True Temper long-handled digging shovel. This tool is durable and dependable to be utilized for general lawn and garden work. It is the most basic garden tool with a tempered steel blade suitable for digging, planting, cutting sod and small roots.
feature_bullets: Cushion end grip for less fatigue
Gray or Natural- color may vary

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars116 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
